articles.description:
Re https://twitter.com/MessariCrypto/status/1672681040484401154

Messari: .@optimismFND's Mainnet introduced the Bedrock upgrade, reducing fees by ~47% and decreasing deposit times.
Gas fees per transaction dropped by approximately 70%, making Optimism Mainnet the cheapest #Eth L2 for token swaps. Bedrock brings Optimism closer to the 'Superchain'. https://t.co/vyiUHV9c50
articles.title: Re https://twitter.com/MessariCrypto/status/1672681040484401154

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 吴说获悉，Messari 发推称，Optimism 完成主网 Bedrock 升级后，将费用降低了约47%，同时减少了存款时间。每笔交易的 Gas 费用下降了约 70% ，使 Optimism 主网成为代币交换中最便宜的以太坊 L2 网络。Bedrock 让 Optimism 与“超级链”更加接近。

好好做面包，面包才会有的

articles.description:
据说今天俄罗斯内乱。 
苏联解体后的1991年到1994年在原苏联加盟国间形成的一个短时期货币同盟。卢布区的国家使用同一种货币，先是苏联卢布，然后是俄罗斯卢布。随着各国陆续放弃使用卢布，转而发行本国的货币，这一货币联盟也随之崩溃。
俄罗斯平民可能集体梭哈比特币！ https://twitter.com/CausMoney/status/1672391688097087489

加美财经caus.com: 俄罗斯军方和安全部门指责瓦格纳雇佣兵老板普里戈津试图发动政变
#乌克兰战争 #俄罗斯 俄罗斯将军们周五晚些时候指控瓦格纳雇佣兵老板叶夫根尼·普里戈津试图对普京发
http://m.caus.com/detail/77186 https://t.co/LwyT0tJKPL

articles.description:
RT Justin Slaughter
So, I respectfully disagree with Noelle on this one. I think BlackRock is doing this on the merits (seeking to get a bitcoin ETF approved) rather than trying to send a political message. 
Bear with me, because this is complicated in terms of Democratic politics.

Noelle Acheson: My take on the BlackRock BTC ETF filing:
- **BIG** news - BlackRock is the world's largest asset manager
- It’s not going to happen
- BlackRock knows this
- Rather, it is sending a political message
- Larry Fink is a prominent Democrat
https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/06/15/blackrocks-ishares-files-paperwork-for-spot-bitcoin-etf/

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
One of most compelling reasons for optimism I’ve seen is real wages (ie wages adjusted for inflation), are staging a robust recovery as inflation comes down and nominal wage growth continues.
If inflation keeps coming down and demand doesn’t fall off a cliff (big if!), probably… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1673040742711799809 https://t.co/HsB7lRiEVd

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re @EricJhonsa Not really seeing evidence of bounce in risk assets cutting short decline in inflation, which continues to look in a steep downtrend
Not saying stocks aren’t stretched or due for a pullback but betting on accelerating inflation seems presumptuous at the moment

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
For those who care about a little thing called “earnings” not sure $csco in 2000 is best comp to $nvda today.
In 2000 the networking demand generated by build out of commercial PC market reached saturation. 
In 2023 the AI build out is approximately one quarters old. https://twitter.com/walterdeemer/status/1672984504489877510 https://t.co/ehURD73WZB


Walter Deemer: Some people comparing NVDA  to CSCO in 2000, when Cisco was the One Stock You Absolutely Had To Own. In case you were wondering, this is how CSCO's run ended: https://t.co/keDgcuZ8ru

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re @TYonClubhouse Unemployment claims https://twitter.com/francoistrahan/status/1671877681925828608?s=46&t=_sZ6xyyOBuoMYsKE6B_heA

Francois Trahan: Initial Claims hit another cycle high this week .... their relationship with monetary policy across time argues this is likely to continue for quite some time. Needless to say what happens to Claims eventually shows up in employment trends and the unemployment rate. We shall see. https://t.co/AulWgyXs6V
articles.title: Re @TYonClubhouse Unemployment claims https://twitter.com/francoistrahan/status/1671877681925828608?s=46&t=_sZ6xyyOBuoMYsKE6B_heA

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Re @TYonClubhouse Hours worked https://twitter.com/calebfranzen/status/1672294307179446277?s=46&t=_sZ6xyyOBuoMYsKE6B_heA

Caleb Franzen: Further evidence of more disinflation coming ahead...
🔴 YoY Headline CPI inflation rate
🔵 Average weekly hrs of all employees
Not a perfect correlation, but this makes sense in a Keynesian approach to economics.
Why?
Hours worked → aggregate income → spending → inflation https://t.co/tSqUCEEY25

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
What is it about wealthy westerners that compels them to cheer on bloodshed
I don’t get it - ordinary Canadians and Americans have no stake in the Russia / Ukraine conflict
This guy and many like him would’ve been cheering on the Iraq invasion in 2002 https://twitter.com/adamscochran/status/1672733064399659008

Adam Cochran (adamscochran.eth): 1/4
Can't believe a year in, idiots are still advocating for ceding to Russia.
Imagine Mexico annexed New Mexico & Arizona as they used to be part of the Spanish empire, had population that was "culturally latino" & then folks in the UK said "you guys should just make peace" https://twitter.com/DavidSacks/status/1672716197379596295
